mutations.name: Mythic Archon Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into an Archon subclass with godlike control over arcane energies
mutations.effectDescription: Achieves perfect mastery over arcane energies, capable of reshaping reality within a limited area

mutations.name: Mythic Colossus Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Colossus subclass with godlike defensive and offensive capabilities
mutations.effectDescription: Becomes virtually invulnerable to damage while capable of devastating attacks

mutations.name: Mythic Phantom Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Phantom subclass with godlike stealth and assassination capabilities
mutations.effectDescription: Can become virtually undetectable and phase through solid matter to deliver perfect killing strikes

mutations.name: Mythic Time Lord Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Time Lord subclass with godlike temporal manipulation abilities
mutations.effectDescription: Achieves mastery over time, capable of creating time loops, accelerating, slowing, or stopping time in a local area

mutations.name: Mythic Transcendent Evolution
mutations.description: Evolves the creature into a Transcendent subclass that exists beyond normal limitations
mutations.effectDescription: Transcends normal limitations of form and function, gaining aspects of all specialized subclasses
